nodes.text: Kelia Freen was a female human information broker living during the Cold War and Galactic War.

Kelia Freen appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the recurring Bounty Contract Week event introduced in Game Update 2.3: Titans of Industry on August 6, 2013. She can appear on a variety of planets randomly selected during the event including Ord Mantell, Coruscant, Nal Hutta, Dromund Kaas, Nar Shaddaa, Tatooine, Alderaan and Voss. The player has the option to ask her for information nicely, rudely or neutrally. In any case, she provides the location of a local crime lord's henchman. As such, her role in the game is almost entirely random or player-driven and a canonical path currently cannot be determined.

When initiating conversation, players of any gender and faction alignment can select the neutral option, which allows them to flirt with Freen. If this option is selected, Freen indicates that she is attracted to the player character, and asks seductively for the player to lean in, so she can whisper information about the local crime lord.
